Text: //ムービー再生
(It's no use. She has me figured out.)

(I did take a bath and drench myself in perfume
before this, but I guess I underestimated Delta's
nose.)
What're you doing here, Delta?
I was hunting!
What were you hunting?
John Smith...!
Boss man, you're John Smith?
Yeah, basically.
Oh‑woof...
That means I can't beat John Smith...
I gotta go tell Alpha!

Hold on. Now, Delta, I need you to listen to me real
close.
See, I'm on a confidential secret mission right now.
A confidential secret mission?

That's right. It's a confidential secret mission that
only a super elite agent can pull off.
Wow, cool!
I wanna do that, too!
No, only I can do this particular mission.

But if you tell Alpha about John Smith, then I'll
fail.
Why?
Because it won't be a secret anymore, see.
So you can't tell anyone about any of this.
But Alpha gave me a mission...
It's okay, I have a new mission for you.
You remember the Shadow Garden's rules, right?
Nope!

The missions I give you take priority over everything
else. Even the ones Alpha gives you.
Alpha won't get mad?
Nah.
(Alpha will definitely get mad.)

(After all, Delta's on an official Mitsugoshi-related
mission right now. Using the outdated Shadow
Garden rules from when we were kids to overrule
it is totally foul play.)
You sure?
I'm sure. After all, this is for the greater good.

(Sorry, Delta. When all this is over, I'll help you
apologize to Alpha.)
The greater good!

That's right. Sorry about this, Delta. When you
finish your mission, I'll give you some kind of
reward.
A reward! You'll do anything I want?!
I will not.

But I promise I'll try, as long as it's something
within my abilities, and as long as it isn't too much
work, and as long as it doesn't cost any money.
You'll do whatever I say?!
Other than those things I said, sure.
You'll do whatever I say!
Other than those things I said, sure.
Hooray! I'll do it! Heehee!
As for your mission... Let's see.

Go straight that way, and you'll eventually hit the
Lawless City. When you do, there'll be a black tower.
In that tower, there's a guy named Juggernaut. Now,
he's a mean old bandit, so I need you to hunt him.
Lawless... Black... Jugglerjanger.
Yup, that sounds right. Black Jugglerjanger.
I'll go hunt him down!
Yup, that's right.
And you'll do whatever I say, Boss man!
Other than those things I said.
You'll do whatever I say!
Other than those things I said.
Got it! I'll go hunt him!
Hee hee!

With that, Delta takes off at a dash. With all that
info, it'll take the others a while to track her
down. That works out perfectly for me.

I feel like she didn't get the details quite right,
but I guess it's all for the greater good.

Delta's acting sucks, so even if I tried to get her
to keep this a secret, I'd be exposed in no time.
At the end of the day, I got her out of the capital,
so we'll chalk that up as a win.

As for Alpha... Well, Delta will be probably be back
by the time the weather warms up.
